cyclone.name: LAURA
cyclone.current_location: about 40 miles SE of St. Croix
cyclone.trajectory: Moving WNW across the northeastern Caribbean, forecast to cross the Greater Antilles, enter the Gulf of Mexico, then curve northwest toward the north-central Gulf Coast (Louisiana/Texas).
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Louisiana coast (between New Orleans and Lake Charles)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical-storm watches span the central Bahamas; hurricane watches not yet issued.
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical-storm warnings now cover Puerto Rico, Virgin Islands, portions of Dominican Republic & Haiti, SE Bahamas and Turks & Caicos.
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northern Leeward Islands, Puerto Rico, Hispaniola, eastern Cuba, then U.S. Gulf Coast from Texas to Alabama.
weather_observation.closest_wind_data_location: None listed near Illinois in wind-probability table
weather_observation.wind: No tropical-storm-force winds expected at Ottawa Port District, IL.
weather_observation.rainfall: Only remnant moisture possible beyond 5 days; heavy rainfall not anticipated.
